fields.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
fields.description: Spaghetti Bolognese is a rich and comforting Italian-inspired pasta dish made with a slow-simmered meat sauce.

fields.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
fields.description: Chicken Alfredo Pasta is a creamy and comforting dish made with chicken, cooked pasta, and a rich Parmesan cream sauce.

fields.title: Indian Chicken Curry
fields.description: Chicken curry from the Indian subcontinent typically features chicken stewed in a tomato-based sauce seasoned with aromatic spices.

fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: This is a real spaghetti carbonara recipe made the traditional Italian way, without a single drop of cream.
